content: Actual results for future periods may differ materially from those expressed or implied by these forward looking statements due to a number of risks or other factors that are described in greater detail under risk factors of company's perspective dated October 20, 2021, filed with the U.S. securities and exchange commission on October 22, 2021, in our quarterly report on form 10-Q, filed with the SEC and our annual report on form 10-K to be filed with the SEC and in our subsequent reports filed from time to time with the SEC, the forward-looking statements included are made only as of the date hereof, we undertake no obligation to update or revise any forward-looking statement as a result of new information or future events, except as otherwise required by law.
